archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0586
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to personalise how I view my services via self service, so that I can easily manage my services so it suits me.

properties.value: What should be the scope of personalization of Self Service? Some examples: labeling of services ("mum's phone") or flagging the favourite ones Parked for Self Service dedicated session.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
